DOC.brief_title: A Prospective Study Comparing Contour SE™ Microspheres Embosphere® Microspheres Treating Symptomatic Uterine Fibroids With Uterine Fibroid Embolization ( UFE )
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose prospective randomize single-center study demonstrate comparability use Contour SE™ Microspheres ( 700-900µ 900-1200µ ) use near stasis endpoint Embosphere® Microspheres ( 500-700µ ) use `` prune tree '' endpoint achieve post UFE fibroid devascularization woman symptomatic uterine fibroid . The study demonstrate ( use contrast enhance Magnetic Resonance Imaging ( MRI ) baseline 24-hours post embolization ) uterine fibroid successfully devascularized use embolization protocol . Contrast enhance MRI perform baseline , 24-hours , 3-months post UFE . The subject follow 12-months post UFE change baseline symptom severity ( Quality Life ( QoL ) Questionnaire ) assess 3 month 12 month .
DOC.criteria: One follow symptom : abnormal menstrual bleeding , infertility related fibroid , pelvic pain , and/or bulk/pressure relate symptom attribute fibroid : i.e. , pelvic pressure , abdominal enlargement , abdominal bloating , gastrointestinal pressure symptom ( backache , constipation ) , dysfunction urinary bladder ( urinary frequency , urinary retention ) , vaginal pressure , rectal pressure .
